Apple___Apple_scab.cause: Fungal infection caused by Venturia inaequalis.
Apple___Apple_scab.prevention: Use scab-resistant varieties, apply fungicides during the growing season.
Apple___Apple_scab.precautions: Prune and remove fallen leaves and debris to reduce overwintering spores.

Apple___Black_rot.cause: Fungal infection caused by Botryosphaeria obtusa.
Apple___Black_rot.prevention: Remove and destroy infected fruits and leaves, apply fungicides.
Apple___Black_rot.precautions: Ensure proper air circulation by pruning and spacing trees.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.cause: Fungal infection caused by Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.prevention: Use resistant apple varieties, remove nearby juniper trees.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.precautions: Apply fungicides during the growing season.

Blueberry___healthy.prevention: Ensure proper care and disease management.

Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.cause: Fungal infection caused by Podosphaera clandestina.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Apply fungicides, ensure proper spacing and pruning.

Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray.cause: Fungal infection caused by Cercospora zeae-maydis.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.cause: Fungal infection caused by Puccinia sorghi.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.prevention: Use resistant hybrids, apply fungicides if necessary.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.cause: Fungal infection caused by Exserohilum turcicum.

Corn_(maize)___healthy.prevention: Ensure proper care and disease management.

Grape___Black_rot.cause: Fungal infection caused by Guignardia bidwellii.
Grape___Black_rot.prevention: Apply fungicides, remove infected plant parts.
Grape___Black_rot.precautions: Prune vines for better air circulation.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).cause: Complex of fungal pathogens including Phaeoacremonium and Phaeomoniella.

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.cause: Fungal infection caused by Pseudopezicula tracheiphila.
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.prevention: Apply fungicides, maintain proper canopy management.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).cause: Bacterial infection caused by Candidatus Liberibacter species, spread by psyllid insects.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).prevention: Control psyllid population, remove and destroy infected trees.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.cause: Bacterial infection caused by Xanthomonas campestris pv. pruni.
Peach___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use resistant varieties, apply copper-based bactericides.

Peach___healthy.prevention: Ensure proper care and disease management.

Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.cause: Bacterial infection caused by Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use resistant varieties, apply copper-based bactericides.

Pepper,_bell___healthy.prevention: Ensure proper care and disease management.

Potato___Early_blight.cause: Fungal infection caused by Alternaria solani.
Potato___Early_blight.precautions: Crop rotation and remove plant debris.

Potato___Late_blight.cause: Fungal infection caused by Phytophthora infestans.

Potato___healthy.prevention: Ensure proper care and disease management.

Raspberry___healthy.prevention: Ensure proper care and disease management.

Soybean___healthy.prevention: Ensure proper care and disease management.

Squash___Powdery_mildew.cause: Fungal infection caused by Podosphaera xanthii.
Squash___Powdery_mildew.prevention: Apply fungicides, ensure proper spacing and sunlight.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.cause: Fungal infection caused by Diplocarpon earlianum.

Strawberry___healthy.prevention: Ensure proper care and disease management.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.cause: Bacterial infection caused by Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot.prevention: Use resistant varieties, apply copper-based bactericides.

Tomato___Early_blight.cause: Fungal infection caused by Alternaria solani.
Tomato___Early_blight.precautions: Crop rotation and remove plant debris.

Tomato___Late_blight.cause: Fungal infection caused by Phytophthora infestans.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.prevention: Ensure proper air circulation by spacing plants adequately and pruning. Avoid overhead watering to minimize leaf wetness.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold.precautions: Remove infected leaves immediately and use fungicides if necessary.

Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.prevention: Rotate crops, avoid overhead watering, and remove affected leaves to reduce the spread.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot.precautions: Use resistant varieties if available and apply fungicides as needed.

Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.prevention: Maintain proper irrigation and use insecticidal soap or neem oil to control mite populations.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider.precautions: Regularly monitor plants for mite infestations and manage weeds around the garden.

Tomato___Target_Spot.prevention: Practice crop rotation and avoid overhead irrigation to reduce leaf wetness.
Tomato___Target_Spot.precautions: Remove and destroy infected plant debris and use fungicides as necessary.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Control whitefly populations with insecticides and use resistant varieties.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.precautions: Remove infected plants to prevent the spread of the virus.

Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.prevention: Use virus-free seeds and avoid smoking near plants. Disinfect tools and wash hands thoroughly before handling plants.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus.precautions: Remove and destroy infected plants immediately.

Tomato___healthy.prevention: Maintain optimal growing conditions and monitor plants regularly.
Tomato___healthy.precautions: Continue with standard care practices to ensure plants remain healthy.
